verses.text: “\w Can|strong="H4758"\w* \w you|strong="H1571"\w* draw \w out|strong="H2904"\w* Leviathan\f + \fr 41:1 \ft Leviathan is a name for a crocodile or similar creature.\f* \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fish hook, \w or|strong="H1571"\w* press \w down|strong="H2904"\w* \w his|strong="H1571"\w* tongue \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cord?

\w Can|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rope into \w his|strong="H6440"\w* nose, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* pierce \w his|strong="H6440"\w* jaw \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hook?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* many petitions \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w or|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* speak soft words \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* should take \w him|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* servant forever?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* play \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bird? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* bind \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* girls?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* traders barter \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* part \w him|strong="H6440"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H6440"\w* merchants?
Can you fill \w his|strong="H5462"\w* skin with barbed irons, \w or|strong="H4043"\w* \w his|strong="H5462"\w* head with fish spears?

Lay \w your|strong="H3808"\w* hand \w on|strong="H3808"\w* him. Remember \w the|strong="H5066"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H5066"\w* do \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H3920"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1692"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* vain. Won’t \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* cast down \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1692"\w*?

None \w is|strong="H5869"\w* so fierce \w that|strong="H5869"\w* he dare stir \w him|strong="H5869"\w* up. Who then \w is|strong="H5869"\w* he who \w can|strong="H5869"\w* \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H1980"\w* \w has|strong="H6310"\w* first given \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*, \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* repay \w him|strong="H1980"\w*? Everything under \w the|strong="H1980"\w* heavens \w is|strong="H6310"\w* mine.

“\w I|strong="H3318"\w* \w will|strong="H6227"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* keep silence concerning \w his|strong="H3318"\w* limbs, nor \w his|strong="H3318"\w* mighty strength, nor \w his|strong="H3318"\w* goodly frame.

\w Who|strong="H5315"\w* can strip \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* outer garment? \w Who|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* within \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w jaws|strong="H6310"\w*?

Who can \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Around|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* teeth \w is|strong="H6440"\w* terror.

\w Strong|strong="H4651"\w* scales \w are|strong="H1077"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* pride, shut \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w together|strong="H1692"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w close|strong="H1692"\w* seal.
One \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H3644"\w* near \w to|strong="H3820"\w* another, \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H3332"\w* air can come between them.
\w They|strong="H7667"\w* are joined \w to|strong="H1481"\w* one another. \w They|strong="H7667"\w* stick \w together|strong="H1481"\w*, so that \w they|strong="H7667"\w* can’t be pulled apart.

\w His|strong="H6965"\w* sneezing flashes \w out|strong="H6965"\w* light. \w His|strong="H6965"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H2719"\w* like \w the|strong="H6965"\w* eyelids \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* morning.
\w Out|strong="H2803"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth go burning torches. Sparks \w of|strong="H6086"\w* fire leap \w out|strong="H2803"\w*.

\w Out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* nostrils \w a|strong="H3068"\w* smoke goes, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boiling pot \w over|strong="H2015"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w of|strong="H1121"\w* reeds.
\w His|strong="H2803"\w* breath kindles coals. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* flame goes \w out|strong="H2803"\w* \w of|strong="H2803"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth.
\w There|strong="H8478"\w* \w is|strong="H2742"\w* strength \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neck. Terror dances \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7760"\w* flakes \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* flesh are joined \w together|strong="H3220"\w*. \w They|strong="H7760"\w* are firm \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*. \w They|strong="H7760"\w* \w can|strong="H5518"\w*’t \w be|strong="H3220"\w* moved.

\w His|strong="H2803"\w* heart \w is|strong="H8415"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* firm \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone, yes, firm \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H2803"\w* lower millstone.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* raises \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mighty \w are|strong="H6213"\w* afraid. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* retreat \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* thrashing.

\w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* attacks \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sword, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w*’t prevail; \w nor|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spear, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dart, \w nor|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pointed shaft.
He counts iron as straw, and bronze as rotten wood.
The arrow can’t make him flee. Sling stones are like chaff to him.
Clubs are counted as stubble. He laughs at the rushing of the javelin.
His undersides are like sharp potsherds, leaving \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trail in the mud like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* threshing sledge.
He makes the deep to boil like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pot. He makes the sea like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pot of ointment.
He makes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* path shine after him. One would think the deep had white hair.
On earth there is not his equal, that is made without fear.
He sees everything that is high. He is king over all the sons of pride.”
